title: Why Is There So Much Oil?
description: In this weekly documentary, Bloomberg Originals explores how the world got to this strange place of oversupply and what it means for the future.
content: In this weekly documentary, Bloomberg Originals explores how the world got to this strange place of oversupply and what it means for the future.
